string-array.name: long_short_click_key_map_summary
string-array.item:
"Left button (short press) -> Back 
Left button (long press) -> Menu 
Right button (long press) -> Page up 
Right button (short press) -> Page down"

"Left button (short press) -> Page up 
Left button (long press) -> Back 
Right button (long press) -> Menu 
Right button (short press) -> Page down"

"Left button (short press) -> Page down 
Left button (long press) -> Page up 
Right button (long press) -> Menu 
Right button (short press) -> Back"

"Left button (short press) -> Page down 
Left button (long press) -> Menu 
Right button (long press) -> Back 
Right button (short press) -> Page up"

string-array.name: long_short_click_key_map_summary_for_tp_model
string-array.item:
"Left button (Short press) -> Page up
Left button (Long press) -> Screen refresh
Right button (Short press) -> Page down
Right button (Long press) -> Menu"

"Left button (Short press) -> Page down
Left button (Long press) -> Screen refresh
Right button (Short press) -> Page down
Right button (Long press) -> Page up"

"Left button (Short press) -> Page down
Left button (long press) -> Page up
Right button (Short press) -> Page down
Right button (Long press) -> Dictionary"

"Left button (Short press) -> Page up
Left button (Long press) -> Screen refresh
Right button (short press) -> Page down
Right button (Long press) -> Dictionary"
